name: XQuarantine
short_description:
The quarantine for XWall.
We need enable Statistic and History in XWall. After login on the site User(only own letter) or Administrator(any letter) can resend message to recipient. For authentication it use SQL and LDAP.

You can try it:
   1. Unzip this archive.
   2. Enable Statistic and History. https://www.youtube.com/watch?feature=player_detailpage&v=kSadWt_H4Uo
   3. Run 0_firstconfig.bat and do configuration https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fcqRpE6Z61M&feature=player_detailpage
   4. Run 1_start.bat https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=p6fG1jAZFN8&feature=player_detailpage

By default records of database updated every 5 minute
As admin you can update manual http://127.0.0.1/adminspace/loadfromfile or http://127.0.0.1/adminspace/loadfromfile?file=path to file
